justification: "The self-rating measure PDMS was assessed with 25 items … The PDMS allows describing individuals' self-perceived degree of proactivity on six dimensions."

measured_by: Career Choice Resilience scale – CCSE subscale
justification: "Career choice self-efficacy (CCSE)… was measured by five items as a short version of Fouad et al.'s Middle School Self-Efficacy scale (1997) with Cronbach's alpha =.91."

measured_by: Career Choice Resilience scale – OSE subscale
justification: "Occupational self-efficacy (OSE)… was also captured by five items developed by Ratschinski (2014; α =.86)."

measured_by: Short version of von Collani & Herzberg Self-Esteem Scale
justification: "Self-esteem (SE) was … operationalized by five positively phrased items as a short version of von Collani & Herzberg (2003) self-esteem scale with Cronbach's alpha at .87."

measured_by: Short version of Wagnild & Young Resilience Scale
justification: "General resilience (GR) was assessed using five items of the resilience scale by Wagnild and Young (1993) … Ratschinski (2014) applied this scale … derived a reduced 5-item scale (α =.84)."
"Two instruments were used to validate KLUG: the Proactive Decision Making Scale (PDMS) and Ratschinski's scale for career choice resilience (CCR; 2014)."
